subject: Stanley Cup
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The fans were expectant of victory at the start of what Coach Alain Vigneault called the biggest hockey game in New York in 20 years, but the Rangers were dominated by the Los Angeles Kings.
snippet: The fans were expectant of victory at the start of what Coach Alain Vigneault called the biggest hockey game in New York in 20 years, but the Rangers were dominated by the Los Angeles Kings.
